data.name: Yamafuda! 2nd station - Design Works YamaMook!
data.detailed_description:
• ・Newly drawn illustrations by graphic designer Lee
  • Character design
  • Card Illustration
  • Rough illustration
  • Game Design Memo (Japanese)
  • 30 pages of full-color

Yamafuda! 2nd station - Design Works "YamaMook!"

It contains about a third of the in-game materials. This is a product for those who can support the production.

How to browse

1.Right-click on "Yamafuda" in the Steam library.
2.Select Properties > Local File > Browse
3.Open "YamaMook_EN.pdf".

data.short_description: These are the setting materials, rough illustrations and specifications used in the production process of "Yamafuda! 2nd station". There are also a few new drawings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
